original_text: See my hands and my feet, that it is I myself. Touch me, and see. For a spirit does not have flesh and bones as you see that I have.”
korean_text: 내 손과 발을 보고 나인 줄 알라 또 나를 만져 보라 영은 살과 뼈가 없으되 너희 보는 바와 같이 나는 있느니라

sentences.original_text: See my hands and my feet
For a spirit does not have flesh and bones
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 영은 살과 뼈가 없기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: as you see that I have
